Summary: 3 orb shaped objects flying over home in Crocker Amazon District.
divs: Sighting DetailsI happened to be outside in my backyard at 9pm having a smoke and when I looked up at the stars and immediately saw three orbs that flew from south to north direction. They were about at the height of a helicopter and the three orbs were flying in slight triangular formation, but not fully in sync as one or two would wobble out of formation briefly. Clearly, I knew it was not a aircraft with no flashing lights. I see planes fly above from SFO everyday and the orbs were white, but not a star-bright type of light nor were they twinkling. I knew immediately as I saw them that they were not birds or planes or evening a comet or shooting star and they produced no noise. I've seen the difference of all of that at night and I am also not a big firm believer in UFOs, but still don't know what I saw in those three orbs.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around April 16th 2009
